verses.verse: עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now תִּתְגֹּדְדִ֣י <WH1413> Now gather בַת־ <WH1323> O daughter גְּד֔וּד <WH1416> thyself in troops מָצ֖וֹר <WH4692> siege שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> he hath laid עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> against בַּשֵּׁ֙בֶט֙ <WH7626> with a rod יַכּ֣וּ <WH5221> against us they shall smite עַֽל־ <WH5921> against הַלְּחִ֔י <WH3895> upon the cheek אֵ֖ת <WH853> שֹׁפֵ֥ט <WH8199> the judge יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you בֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <WH1035> But thou Bethlehem אֶפְרָ֗תָה <WH672> Ephratah צָעִיר֙ <WH6810> [though] thou be little לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <WH1961> to be among בְּאַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> among the thousands יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> at לִ֣י יֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> [yet] out of thee shall he come forth לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> unto me [that is] to be ruler בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וּמוֹצָאֹתָ֥יו <WH4163> whose goings forth מִקֶּ֖דֶם <WH6924> [have been] from of old מִימֵ֥י <WH3117> the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of eternity

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore יִתְּנֵ֔ם <WH5414> Therefore will he give them up עַד־ <WH5704> them until עֵ֥ת <WH6256> until the time יוֹלֵדָ֖ה <WH3205> [that] she which travaileth יָלָ֑דָה <WH3205> hath brought forth וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> then the remnant אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> of his brethren יְשׁוּב֖וּן <WH7725> shall return עַל־ <WH5921> unto בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְעָמַ֗ד <WH5975> And he shall stand וְרָעָה֙ <WH7462> and feed בְּעֹ֣ז <WH5797> in the strength יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God בִּגְא֕וֹן <WH1347> in the majesty שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> of the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God וְיָשָׁ֕בוּ <WH3427> and they shall abide כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> time יִגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> for now shall he be great עַד־ <WH5704> against אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> And this [man] shall be the peace אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <WH804> when the Assyrian כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יָב֣וֹא <WH935> shall come בְאַרְצֵ֗נוּ <WH776> into our land וְכִ֤י <WH3588> When יִדְרֹךְ֙ <WH1869> and when he shall tread בְּאַרְמְנֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH759> in our palaces וַהֲקֵמֹ֤נוּ <WH6965> then shall we raise עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> against him seven רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> shepherds וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <WH8083> and eight נְסִיכֵ֥י <WH5257> principal אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> men

וְרָע֞וּ <WH7489> afflict אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> the land אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> of Assyria בַּחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and the land נִמְרֹ֖ד <WH5248> of Nimrod בִּפְתָחֶ֑יהָ <WH6607> in the entrances וְהִצִּיל֙ <WH5337> thereof thus shall he deliver מֵֽאַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> [us] from the Assyrian כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יָב֣וֹא <WH935> when he cometh בְאַרְצֵ֔נוּ <WH776> into our land וְכִ֥י <WH3588> and when יִדְרֹ֖ךְ <WH1869> and when he treadeth בִּגְבוּלֵֽנוּ׃ <WH1366> within our borders ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> Then שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> And the remnant יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH7130> shall be in the midst עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> of many כְּטַל֙ <WH2919> as a dew מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD כִּרְבִיבִ֖ים <WH7241> as the showers עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on עֵ֑שֶׂב <WH6212> upon the grass אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְקַוֶּה֙ <WH6960> that tarrieth לְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> not for man וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Or יְיַחֵ֖ל <WH3176> nor waiteth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <WH7611> And the remnant יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> of Jacob בַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> shall be among the Gentiles בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH7130> in the midst עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> of many כְּאַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> as a lion בְּבַהֲמ֣וֹת <WH929> among the beasts יַ֔עַר <WH3293> of the forest כִּכְפִ֖יר <WH3715> as a young lion בְּעֶדְרֵי־ <WH5739> among the flocks צֹ֑אן <WH6629> of sheep אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> Which אִם <WH518> if עָבַ֛ר <WH5674> who if he go through וְרָמַ֥ס <WH7429> both treadeth down וְטָרַ֖ף <WH2963> and teareth in pieces וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and none can deliver

תָּרֹ֥ם <WH7311> shall be lifted up יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> Thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against צָרֶ֑יךָ <WH6862> upon thine adversaries וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <WH341> and all thine enemies יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <WH3772> shall be cut off פ

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> that I will cut off סוּסֶ֖יךָ <WH5483> thy horses מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> out of the midst וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖י <WH6> of thee and I will destroy מַרְכְּבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4818> thy chariots
וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <WH3772> And I will cut off עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> the cities אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> of thy land וְהָרַסְתִּ֖י <WH2040> and throw down כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִבְצָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4013> all thy strong holds

וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> And I will cut off כְשָׁפִ֖ים <WH3785> witchcrafts מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> out of thine hand וּֽמְעוֹנְנִ֖ים <WH6049> and thou shalt have no [more] soothsayers לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> will have לָֽךְ׃

וְהִכְרַתִּ֧י <WH3772> also will I cut off פְסִילֶ֛יךָ <WH6456> Thy graven images וּמַצֵּבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH4676> and thy standing images מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> out of the midst וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> you will no תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <WH7812> of thee and thou shalt no more worship ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer לְמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3027> of thine hands
וְנָתַשְׁתִּ֥י <WH5428> And I will pluck up אֲשֵׁירֶ֖יךָ <WH842> thy groves מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> out of the midst וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י <WH8045> of thee so will I destroy עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5892> your cities

וְעָשִׂ֜יתִי <WH6213> And I will execute בְּאַ֧ף <WH639> in anger וּבְחֵמָ֛ה <WH2534> and fury נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> vengeance אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> such as they have not heard ס
